name: sdl-acp-project
description: TA project to automate tests for SDL in ACP
author: Symphony

scripts.sdl-admin-test: npm run lint && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha -r ts-node/register  --timeout 90000 spec/sdlAdminTest/*.int.ts --reporter @symphony/rtc-greenkeeper-lib/dist/reporter --reporter xunit --reporter-option output=test-results/sdl_acp/results.xml
